{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3476731,"name":"Larry Gros","username":"Larry624","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/l/ecae2f/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-01-09T15:34:20.876Z","cooked":"

Can we shift the sprocket and chain for the WCP GreyT elevator to the side to free up the center of the elevator?

How do we modify the rigging so the carriage only travels from midway on the second stage to the top of the second stage when the first stage travels full distance. We don’t want the carriage to go all the way down when the elevator is down

We are thinking of doing that as well but our elevator kits havent come in yet so we cannot test it

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2025-01-14T04:03:19.777Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":299,"readers_count":298,"score":74.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":480446,"topic_slug":"modify-wcp-greyt-elevator","display_username":"Matt Dicks","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":71256,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/modify-wcp-greyt-elevator/480446/2","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3481762,"name":"s-neff","username":"s-neff","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/s-neff/{size}/9062_2.png","created_at":"2025-01-14T04:20:26.638Z","cooked":"
Larry624:

Can we shift the sprocket and chain for the WCP GreyT elevator to the side to free up the center of the elevator?

Yes, though there’s a good chance it’ll bind from uneven loading, which you could address with a second chain and sprocket with cross-shaft (reference TTB designs)

Larry624:

How do we modify the rigging so the carriage only travels from midway on the second stage to the top of the second stage when the first stage travels full distance.

Fun problem! Maybe find a way to cascade it through a tackleblock-style reduction? There are no pre-packaged solutions, you’ll have to think hard for yourself on this one.

I see the rope is backordered, if you order a full elevator kit would it ship everything but the rope right away?

","post_number":6,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2025-01-14T04:36:40.189Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":5,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":227,"readers_count":226,"score":50.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":480446,"topic_slug":"modify-wcp-greyt-elevator","display_username":"Dominick Ferone","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":9979,"username":"R.C","name":"R.C.","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/r.c/{size}/264998_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":19411,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"353/358 Mentor - Formerly 5030/9016 "},"post_url":"/t/modify-wcp-greyt-elevator/480446/6","custom_user_title":"353/358 Mentor - Formerly 5030/9016 ","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3481805,"name":"R.C.","username":"R.C","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/r.c/{size}/264998_2.png","created_at":"2025-01-14T04:53:46.691Z","cooked":"

Yes,

We’ve been shipping all of the in-stock elevator kit components. The core kit itself is available; however, we’re currently backordered on a collar and rope. We have a large shipment of additional components on the way by air and sea, and we anticipate being fully restocked soon. At the minimum these are components can easily source/use some in term solution.

for the double chain elevator do you know what extra parts will be needed other than the main elevator kit?

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2025-01-14T04:56:20.097Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":7,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":211,"readers_count":210,"score":52.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":480446,"topic_slug":"modify-wcp-greyt-elevator","display_username":"Matt Dicks","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":9979,"username":"R.C","name":"R.C.","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/r.c/{size}/264998_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":71256,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/modify-wcp-greyt-elevator/480446/8","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3481809,"name":"R.C.","username":"R.C","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/r.c/{size}/264998_2.png","created_at":"2025-01-14T05:00:06.591Z","cooked":"

I’m currently not near CAD but from memory:

-Shaft
-Bearing Mounts
-Chain
-Sprockets
-Chain attachment braken

Basically mirror the current attachment to be more symmetrical. We’ll probably make a kit for this so teams can just grab those parts easier.

What is CC?
If we put double chains, takes up a lot of room probably doesn’t leave enough clear space in center. Need about 6"

The West Coast Products Competitive Concept (WCP CC) is a simple but competitive robot designed by WCP teamthat will probably use a lot of WCP components (sounds like an elevator) and be able to play many aspects of the game.

okay, I saw the CC. Yes, exactly why we wanted the center of the elevator to be clear. Wide elevator we were concerned moving chain to the side and potentially binding. With two chains, how do you ensure motors are exactly in sync or are both chains driven from same gearbox?
